# Scope

This chapter elaborates the core constructs referenced in the slides and links to primary sources.

## Prolific vs Everyday Liars

- Skewed distribution: a minority accounts for a large share of lies.
- Measurement approaches (diaries, experience sampling).

## Motives and Audiences

- Prosocial vs self-serving lies; status/power dynamics.
- Recipients: friends, partners, authority, strangers; online vs offline.

## Strategies and Channels

- Faking good/bad; malingering; charm; feigned friendship.
- Channels: facial/gestural, vocal/prosodic, linguistic/textual, physiological.
